src_original: yadutādhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni,  tāni rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyaty,
adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati mahadgatāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni,
tāni rūpaṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyaty,  evaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ dvitīyam abhibhvāyatanam;
adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni,

tadyathomāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā bāraṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam,  evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhasānīdaṃ tṛtīyam abhibhvāyatanam;  adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni,
adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsāni,
tadyathā bandhujīvakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā bārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ lohitaṃ lohitavarṇaṃ lohitanidarśanaṃ lohitanirbhāsam,
